exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2233 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear (exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H :: P) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros Q p H. induction H. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p s. + auto. + auto. + apply IHCombLinear. + reflexivity.
